title: M.S Cuplock Vertical
description: Durable MS Cuplock Standards providing maximum load-bearing strength and stability on tall structures. Designed for fast assembly and long life with corrosion-resistant finish.
features: Ideal for tall and heavy-duty scaffolding

title: M.S Cuplock Ledger
description: High-strength ledgers offering horizontal support and alignment in modular scaffolding systems. Built to deliver consistent stability and durability.

title: U Jack
description: Precision-threaded adjustable U Jack for accurate leveling and height adjustment in scaffolding systems. Essential for achieving stability on uneven surfaces.

title: Aluminium Formwork – Slab
description: Durable Mivan panels ensuring precision, speed, and smooth concrete finishes. Perfect for repetitive casting and modern building applications.

title: Aluminium Formwork – Wall
description: Robust wall panels designed for consistent and precise wall casting, ensuring faster and smoother project execution.

title: MS Round Pipe
description: Heavy-duty round pipes suitable for scaffolding, bracing, and general construction use. Designed for strength and durability under load.
features: Suitable for structural and industrial use
Available in multiple sizes and thicknesses

title: MS C Channel
description: Durable MS C Channels used for fabrication, reinforcement, and support structures. Ideal for framing and load-bearing applications.

title: Walkway Jali
description: Anti-slip galvanized MS walkway jali for safe and stable movement at construction sites and elevated work areas.

title: H Frame
description: Rigid MS H Frame for plastering, painting, and façade work. Provides easy setup, strong vertical alignment, and long-term durability.
